script: fillBlockState(midX - 2, minY + 1, midZ - 2, midX + 2, maxY - 5, midZ + 2, 'minecraft:air')
fillBlockState(midX - 2, maxY - 3, midZ - 2, midX + 2, maxY - 1, midZ + 2, 'minecraft:air')
fillBlockState(midX, minY + 1, midZ, midX, maxY - 1, midZ, palette.logState(axis: 'y'))
fillBlockState(midX - 1, minY + 1, midZ, midX - 1, maxY - 1, midZ, 'minecraft:ladder[facing=west,waterlogged=false]')
fillBlockState(midX + 1, minY + 1, midZ, midX + 1, maxY - 1, midZ, 'minecraft:ladder[facing=east,waterlogged=false]')
fillBlockState(midX, minY + 1, midZ - 1, midX, maxY - 1, midZ - 1, 'minecraft:ladder[facing=north,waterlogged=false]')
fillBlockState(midX, minY + 1, midZ + 1, midX, maxY - 1, midZ + 1, 'minecraft:ladder[facing=south,waterlogged=false]')
